thread.title: Barcelona post fascinating video giving us a glimpse of a day in the life of Neymar

author: Row Zed
title: Barcelona post fascinating video giving us a glimpse of a day in the life of Neymar
text:
Barcelona post fascinating video giving us a glimpse of a day in the life of Neymar Not jealous at all, not one bit... Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now A day in the life of the Barcelona star Share this video Get FC Barcelona updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Every wondered what a day in the life of Barcelona stay Neymar is like? 
Well wonder no more. 
The Catalan giants have produced a click little video giving us all a glimpse of what the Brazilian's day-to-day routine is like, from the training pitch to matchday. 
Sadly there are no shots of him partying the night away like he did with his on-off girlfriend Bruna Marquezine in Sao Paulo this week. 
And Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho this week revealed the he thinks it would be "impossible" to sign Neymar , despite reports linking the Barca star to Old Trafford. 
The video shows Neymar arriving for training before boarding a plan with his team-mates for a game, interacting with fans and of course, doing the business on the pitch. poll loading Should Neymar move to the Premier League this summer? 0+ VOTES SO FAR No, he's better off at Barcelona Like us on Facebook
